p: This surfactant-assisted emulsion method has been adopted to a variety of other complex NP systems, such as Au-gamma-Fe 2O 3 ( Shang et al., 2017), PbS-gamma-Fe 2O 3 ( Ortgies et al., 2016), magnetic Au NPs ( Wang et al., 2018c), Au-CeO 2 ( Chen et al., 2011), and zinc ferrite NPs ( Park et al., 2017). Overall, the method shows versatility in the synthesis of new types of active superparticles from different NP building blocks.
